name: distractingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is distracting (= taking your attention away from something that you are trying to do, watch, think about, etc.): My opponent was distractingly handsome. A fly buzzed distractingly around his head.
More examplesFewer examplesThe actor's attempt at an Irish accent is distractingly bad at times.My friend visited the office with her distractingly adorable baby.I made the cakes distractingly colourful in the hope nobody would notice the taste.Many people create unclear, distractingly flashy presentations.Distractingly, the director keeps changing the angle of the shot in the middle of the interviews.
